text: Euplica festiva is a species of sea snail, a marine gastropod mollusk in the family Columbellidae, the dove snails. ==Description== The shell size varies between 7 mm and 11 mm ==Distribution== This species is distributed in the Red Sea, the Gulf of Aden, the Indian Ocean along Chagos, Madagascar, the Seychelles and Réunion and along West India, the Bonin Islands and south of Japan. ==References== ==External links== * Category:Columbellidae Category:Gastropods described in 1834
title: Euplica festiva
